prerequisite: Cleric or paladin, proficiency with warhammer or throwing hammer, must worship Moradin
name: Hammer of Moradin
text: As a devotee of Moradin, you have dedicated yourself to the destruction of your god’s traditional enemies and the protection of his faith. In return for your dedication, Moradin lends strength to your hand and shields you with his power. In some lands, hammers of Moradin form an elite knightly order of clerics and paladins who defend dwarven citadels. Others are solitary agents of order who use their powers to protect the weak and confront injustice wherever they encounter it.

features.hammerBond(11thLevel): You gain a +1 bonus to attack rolls with hammers
features.powerfulAction(11thLevel): When you spend an action point to make an attack, each target hit by the attack is knocked prone or dazed until the end of your next turn
features.champion’sAura(16thLevel): You and any allies within 3 squares of you gain a +4 bonus to all defenses against fear effects

flavorText: I strike in the name of the Soul Forger. Let my enemies taste Moradin’s wrath!
